languages.text: This creature strikes its target with its claws. The target must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty. On a failed test, the target suffers bleeding (4).
languages.original_text: Существо бьет цель своими когтями. Цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −40 и в случае провала получает кровотечение (4).

languages.text: Attack with claws. Applies bleeding (4) on failed Toughness (-40) check.

Существо бьет цель своими когтями. Цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −40 и в случае провала получает кровотечение (4).

languages.text: La criatura golpea a su objetivo con sus garras. El objetivo debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −40. Si falla, sufre hemorragia (4).
languages.original_text: This creature strikes its target with its claws. The target must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty. On a failed test, the target suffers bleeding (4).

languages.text: このクリーチャーは爪でターゲットを攻撃する。ターゲットは-40ペナルティで、耐久力抵抗判定に合格しなければならない。判定に失敗した場合、ターゲットは出血(4)を負う。
languages.original_text: This creature strikes its target with its claws. The target must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty. On a failed test, the target suffers bleeding (4).

languages.text: 使用利爪攻击目标。被命中的目标需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-40减值。若未能通过检定，则会受到流血（4）效果影响。
languages.original_text: This creature strikes its target with its claws. The target must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty. On a failed test, the target suffers bleeding (4).

languages.text: Cette créature assène un coup de griffe à sa cible, qui doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec une pénalité de −40. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet Saignement (4).
languages.original_text: This creature strikes its target with its claws. The target must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty. On a failed test, the target suffers bleeding (4).

languages.text: Diese Kreatur attackiert das Ziel mit ihren Klauen. Das Ziel muss eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit mit einem Abzug von −40 bestehen, um nicht mit Blutung (4) belegt zu werden.
languages.original_text: This creature strikes its target with its claws. The target must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty. On a failed test, the target suffers bleeding (4).

languages.text: Bu yaratık, hedefine pençeleriyle saldırır. Hedef, −40 ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçmelidir. Hedef, başarısız bir testte kanamaya (4) maruz kalır.
